tag-gettingstarted_edit-description: Edit made via the [[{{MediaWiki:gettingstarted-project-link}}|GettingStarted]] system, which suggests easy tasks to editors and shows them how to complete them.
gettingstarted-task-toolbar-editing-help: Show a guide on how to edit
gettingstarted-task-toolbar-no-suggested: Sorry. We couldn't find more pages to be improved at the moment. Try again in a moment or search for your own topics of interest.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-des: This page may have spelling or grammar errors you can fix.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-try: Go to a random page you can improve by copyediting
gettingstarted-task-clarify-toolbar-desc: This page may be confusing or vague. Look for ways you can make it clearer.
gettingstarted-task-clarify-toolbar-try-: Go to a random page you can clarify
gettingstarted-task-addlinks-toolbar-des: This page may need more links. Look for terms that have a {{SITENAME}} page.
gettingstarted-task-addlinks-toolbar-try: Go to a random page you can add links to
guidedtour-tour-gettingstartedtasktoolba: This page is identified by other {{SITENAME}} users as needing improvement. You don't have to be an expert in the subject to help.
These banners identify problems with this page. You don't need to fix them all, just stick with what you're comfortable doing.
Click "{{int:vector-view-edit}}" to change content anywhere in the page.
If you want to edit a specific section, you can click on the blue "{{int:editsection}}" link near each section's title.
You can now edit the page contents. When you are done, click "{{int:visualeditor-toolbar-savedialog}}" to review and save your changes.
guidedtour-tour-gettingstarted-click-pre: Clicking "{{int:showpreview}}" allows you to see what the page will look like with your changes. Just don't forget to save.
guidedtour-tour-gettingstarted-click-sav: Click "{{int:savearticle}}" and your changes will be visible.
gettingstarted-cta-text: You can contribute to {{SITENAME}} in different ways
guidedtour-tour-anonymouseditoracquisiti: We recommend you create an account to edit {{SITENAME}}. It's free, easy, and requires no personal information.
Signing up is not required to edit {{SITENAME}}, but it's easy and requires no personal information.
gettingstarted-task-toolbar-no-suggested: Sorry. We couldn't find more articles to be improved at the moment. Try again in a moment or search for your own topics of interest.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-des: This article may have spelling or grammar errors you can fix.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-try: Go to a random article you can improve by copyediting
gettingstarted-task-clarify-toolbar-desc: This article may be confusing or vague. Look for ways you can make it clearer.
gettingstarted-task-clarify-toolbar-try-: Go to a random article you can clarify
gettingstarted-task-addlinks-toolbar-des: This article may need more links. Look for terms that have a {{SITENAME}} article.
gettingstarted-task-addlinks-toolbar-try: Go to a random article you can add links to
guidedtour-tour-gettingstartedtasktoolba: This article is identified by other {{SITENAME}} users as needing improvement. You don't have to be an expert in the subject to help.
These banners identify problems with this article. You don't need to fix them all, just stick with what you're comfortable doing.
Click "{{int:vector-view-edit}}" to change content anywhere in the article.
You can now edit the article contents. When you are done, click "{{int:visualeditor-toolbar-savedialog}}" to review and save your changes.
